person.note: Zhou Bida [7197] His ancestors were Zhengzhou, Guancheng xian residents. His grandfather was Tongpan of Jizhou in the 1120's and settled in Luling xian. Wang Bao's [7086] son-in-law. Bida's elder brother, Biduan [3246], was the son-in-law of Cai Jing's [1649] grandson, Qu [3852]. Zhou Bida served in the state council from his appointment in 1180 until he was made prefect of Tanzhou shortly after Zhao Xiaozong [9011] abdicated in 1189 in favor of the heir apparent, who became Zhao Guangzong. This Zhou lineage seems to have been relatively unsuccessful in perpetuating its degree-holding presence in Jian after Bida's generation. This may be owing to the absence of numerous sons and daughters. Bida had one son, Lun, and one daughter (married to a Xiao), his cousin, Bizheng, only two sons, one daughter and two grandsons when he died at the age of 81 and Bida's younger brother, Biqiang, died at age 33 without any surviving children. Zhou Bida, WJ, 76.1a-3b (wife, born Wang, who married him at age 19 and died in 1203 at age 69); Lou Yue, WJ, 94.1a-25a. CBD, 2, 1468-1471.From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1180: Apt. Canzhi zhengshi (State Council).1182: Apt. Zhi Shumi yuan shi1184: Promoted to Shumi shi1187: Apt. You chengxiang1189: Promoted to Zuo chengxiang1189: Sent out to be prefect of Tanzhou (Hunan).

desc.label: 淳熙五年登第 奉泰和主簿 嘗與辛棄疾、周必大、陳傅良、戴溪、朱熹、呂祖謙等為友 凡三上書於朝 譏切朝政
申孫 登紹興二十一年進士 與周必大同榜 仕不遇 而門人登第歷顯者相望
desc.desc: Friend in the same graduating classAssociation through common membership
Friend in the same graduating classAssociation through common membership

desc.label: 相州安陽人 大伸子 周必大姪外孫 以必大奏為官 監筠州新昌縣酒稅
繳進李塾詞業狀(周文忠公集139/13下)
懷袖有方冊曰材館錄 聞一善人必書 首薦胡銓、周必大等二十人 一時得人稱盛 有奏議詩文等集
遂請祠去 後除秘書少監 張說再除簽書樞密院 必大不具草 予宮觀
權給事中 繳駁不避權倖 曾覿、龍大淵得幸 並遷知閤門事 必大不書黃
累遷太常少卿 光宗即位 言者以為周必大黨 遂與祠 紹熙初起知婺州
番禺人 幼能屬文 長從周必大、楊萬里游 登淳熙五年進士 以薦除司農寺簿
又請誅蘇師旦 罷陳自強 用周必大 遂配欽州 侂冑誅
